# signal

```go
import "clog/signal"
```

Package signal implement some signal bridge to channels. File: "signal.go"

## Variables

<a name="CtrlC"></a>

```go
var (
    CtrlC   chan None // Ctrl+C -> SIGINT or SIGTERM
    CtrlZ   chan None // Ctrl+Z -> SIGTSTP
    CtrlBS  chan None // Ctrl+\ -> SIGQUIT
    SIGTERM chan None
    SIGHUP  chan None
)
```
